description: Led a group of 10-15 kindergarteners, ensuring a fun and safe camp experience. Guided 2-3 co-counselors, directed campers through activities, and maintained a positive atmosphere. Ensured campers adhered to safety protocol and communicated with parents about camper behavior.
Engaged students (ages 9-14) in STEAM through weekly interactive, tech-focused lessons. Collaborated with other instructors to produce engaging and interactive material for sessions.
Work on the web development team to help create project management dashboard
Work on embedded systems in the medical technology field.
